titleStmt.title: The petition of the committees for Ireland to His Majesty. With His Majesties answer of the 1. Decemb. 1642
titleStmt.author: Montgomery, James, Sir.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield printer to the Vniversity,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed by His Majesties command at Oxford [i.e. London] Decemb. 15. :

notesStmt.note: Imprint is false; this is a London re-print. Cf. Madan.
The petition is signed on p. 3: [Sir James] Montgomerie. Hards Waller. Arthur Hill. Au. Mervine.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
